1100100101110101 1101110010000110 1 -> sum: 1010010111111100, cout: 1
0001010100110001 0110101111010111 1 -> sum: 1000000100001001, cout: 0
1000010111000101 1100100111011000 0 -> sum: 0100111110011101, cout: 1

1100111111101111 0101000110111010 0 -> sum: 0010000110101001, cout: 1

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
